sponsorship.title: Redirect 20% of your profit tax
sponsorship.subtitle: Companies can sponsor our association by redirecting up to 20% of their profit tax. It's not an additional cost â€“ it's a redirection from the tax already owed to the state.
sponsorship.why_description: By sponsoring us, you choose to support children and young people from disadvantaged backgrounds, whom we help through our education, mentorship, and personal development programs. With your help, they can have a better life and a real chance at social integration and education.

why_items.item1: You support educational and mentoring programs for vulnerable children and youth
why_items.item2: You contribute to the social and professional integration of young people from disadvantaged backgrounds
why_items.item3: You provide access to extracurricular activities, camps, and development workshops
why_items.item4: You invest in the future of the community and society

sponsorship.how_description: The 20% profit tax redirection is a fiscal facility that allows legal entities to support a cause by redirecting a percentage of their owed profit tax. The sponsorship amounts are deducted from the profit tax according to art. 25, par. 4, pt. i) of the Fiscal Code and the Sponsorship Law 32/1994.
sponsorship.step2_description: Complete the contract with your company's details and the amount you wish to redirect.
sponsorship.step3_description: Send the completed contract to admin@acces-spre-succes.ro.
sponsorship.send_info: After filling in the contract with your company's details, send it by email to:
sponsorship.benefit1: Tax deduction of up to 20% of profit tax
sponsorship.benefit2: Visibility at our events and projects
sponsorship.benefit3: Mention on our website and social media
sponsorship.fiscal_description: According to current legislation, companies that pay profit tax can deduct sponsored amounts from their owed tax, up to the minimum value between 0.75% of turnover and 20% of the annual profit tax owed. The amount must be transferred to the association according to the contract terms.
sponsorship.trust: The sponsorship contract is a simple legal document with no additional obligations.
